channel.title: Whonix Gateway does not connect to the internet
channel.description: Downloaded the whonix gateway ova file via torrent from [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Download]https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Download[/url]. I have installed VirtualBox on my laptop running Windows 7 Professional that connects to the internet via a wireless router. I imported the ova file into VirtualBox I let it run. After whonixcheck starts I get an error saying network is unreachable. [img]http://i.imgur.com/2ZRAv2I.png[/img] Even pinging google.com does not work. I tried customizing the network adapter settings for the 2 adapters I set them both to [img]http://i.imgur.com/IsmuNAp.jpg[/img] But still no luck. Any idea what I am doing wrong?

item.title: Whonix Gateway does not connect to the internet
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
No simple stuff. (There is the clearnet user, but has no DNS by default.) It’s not really needed.

If internet in other VMs is working = internet in Whonix-Gateway is working. And if internet in Whonix-Gateway is working, all that could be in the way is network censorship.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Gateway does not connect to the internet

item.title: Whonix Gateway does not connect to the internet
item.dc:creator: para
item.description:
I reinstalled VirtualBox and it started to work. Or at least now it says tor ok. The workstation connected to it has no internet but I think this is a separate issue.

Is there any way to know for sure that there is internet on the gateway?(you mentioned ping isn’t support to work)
I apologize for the newbie questions.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Gateway does not connect to the internet

Tor works fine on my laptop.
Tried Arm and it doesn’t work.

item.source: Whonix Gateway does not connect to the internet

item.title: Whonix Gateway does not connect to the internet
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
para:

Even pinging google.com does not work.

This is expected. Whonix-Gateway allows only user “tor” and “clearnet” to access “clearnet” by default and there is no system DNS by default (https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix-Gateway_System_DNS).

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Gateway does not connect to the internet

item.title: Whonix Gateway does not connect to the internet
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I tried customizing the network adapter settings for the 2 adapters I set them both to
Don't do this. Delete those VMs and re-import unmodified ones.
Any idea what I am doing wrong?
Please answer the questions that whonixcheck asked.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix Gateway does not connect to the internet

I have installed VirtualBox on my laptop running Windows 7 Professional that connects to the internet via a wireless router.
I imported the ova file into VirtualBox
I let it run.
After whonixcheck starts I get an error saying network is unreachable.


Even pinging google.com does not work.
I tried customizing the network adapter settings for the 2 adapters I set them both to

But still no luck.
Any idea what I am doing wrong?
